name: XPLORE: The Star Fortress
overview: Released as part of the Minigame Competition 2007 - 2K Category. Your spacecraft is flying towards big trouble. You need to get through the deadly forcefield at the Star Fortress and the only way out of this is to blast the forcefield to weaken it. If you hit a forcefield or one of the falling planets, then your spacecraft is toast! You get three shots at it, so good luck!
